summary: Establish recurring pruning sweep for plans and receipts

steps.title: Inventory stale artifacts
steps.notes: List plans marked done >48h ago and oversized receipts in _report/.

steps.title: Prune or archive data
steps.notes: Archive or delete stale items per governance; update docs if needed.

steps.title: Publish pruning summary
steps.notes: Record a receipt summarizing actions and remaining backlog.

checkpoint.description: Stale artifacts handled and pruning cadence documented
